attributes.action: stop all frivolous mps expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should mps claim for hd tvs and cleaners they dont help them do their job any better. i can only claim expenses for work related items so the rules should be the same for them. no fancy items or houses just the basics like the rest of us. they get paid alot of money for what they do they should not be allowed to fiddle or claim for non esential items

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
